Exaggerate: The claim suggests that the candidate is endorsed by the Democratic Party, which is an exaggeration as the party has not officially endorsed him.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide enough evidence or support to prove that the candidate is endorsed by the Democratic Party.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the inclusion of the Democratic Party logo on the mailer implies an endorsement, which may not be the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the possibility that the candidate may have used the Democratic Party logo without official endorsement.
